alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 26 at 2:49PM AKST until January 29 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds could blow around unsecured objects, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be two rounds of high winds during the watch period, Sunday afternoon and again late Sunday night into early Monday. Peak winds are most likely late Sunday night into early Monday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
